caption:
Born
Aug 97
description: I was Born.                                               I generally consider this the biggest mistake of my life since it has caused me nothing but pain and suffering.

caption:
Start playing Chess
Sept 01
description: First time I started playing Chess and I never really stopped. Still absolutely shit though...

caption:
Secondary School
Sep 08
description: Started Secondary school, learnt some stuff, made some friends, did not die. Overall I rate it as a success.

caption:
Parents Divorce
Dec 12
description: It was a long time coming but decided to make it official just after Christmas - FYI to any parents who are reading this, it is a great way to make your kids hate Christmas.

caption:
Dad is diagnosed with Cancer - I also wrote a song
Nov 13
description: If you smoke and drink heavily for 40 years this tends to happen. Definition of "Fuck around and find out."

caption:
Start at Glasgow University - No clue what happened
Sep 15
description: Furthest place away from Loughborough that would accept me.

caption:
Drop out of Uni
Nov 18
description: Best decision of my life - I hated my degree and went for all the wrong reasons.

caption:
Did *something* in London
Nov 18 - Dec 19
description: Had a blast. Also I love Infernos.

caption:
Become a British Army Officer - and somehow end up living here
Jan 20
description: It was emotional, met some cool people and some really shit people.

caption:
Leave the Regular Army
July 24
description: "I'm not saying your job is boring, but changing the Sharepoint page was the most exciting thing to happen to you all year." â€” Major **** 32 Engr Regt
